DisplayText: Major error - Power-up Fault: Power lost and restored in RUN mode.
Fault: The controller that is powered on is in Run mode.

DisplayText: Minor warning Fault F01 - Power-up Fault: power loss detected. Chassis active until DC power cannot be maintained.
Fault: AC power loss detected. Chassis active until DC power cannot be maintained.

DisplayText: Warning occured in a routine of the safety task.
Fault: Correct the warning in the user-program logic.
